short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search selected text on Google Books via right-click and see the results in a new tab. This extension is not an official product.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension allows you to search for selected text on Google Books via right-click.

* This extension is unofficial and is not authorised by, endorsed by or produced by Google or any other company.
